headline: Solventum Appoints Heather Knight as Chief Commercial Officer
summary: Solventum (NYSE: SOLV) announced today the appointment of Heather Knight as Chief Commercial Officer, effective November 10, 2025. In this newly created role, Ms. Knight will oversee global commercial and R&D operations across Solventum's MedSurg, Dental Solutions and Health Information Systems segments, and will report directly to CEO Bryan Hanson.
